metadata.title: CVE-2017-6500 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in ImageMagick 6.9.7. A specially crafted sun filetriggers a heap-based buffer over-read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6500` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.6
imagemagick-common - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.6
libmagick++5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.6
libmagickcore5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.6
libmagickcore5-extra - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.6
libmagickwand5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.6
perlmagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.6').
